short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces rants on Facebook with pictures of cats

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sick and tired of rants on Facebook?  But you don't want to unfriend the person, since after all, they are your friend.  And you don't want to hide all their posts, since sometimes they say nice things.

Solution: Install FaceRant and replace rants with pictures of cats!  And FaceRant also allows you to "reveal" the rant if you change your mind.
